caller_intent: Bill Meyer is seeking clarification on the timeline for receiving a refund after canceling two insurance policies, which are tied to his former employment at Excel Construction.
resolution_steps: Jeff confirms that refund calculations require processing policy cancellations first, which are submitted directly to the insurance carriers.
Jeff estimates cancellations will be processed by mid-next week, with refunds mailed afterward (typically taking 1-2 weeks).
Jeff acknowledges the uncertainty in timing due to carrier processes and offers to expedite if possible.
summary: Bill Meyer discusses refund expectations after canceling two insurance policies. Jeff explains that refunds depend on carrier-processed cancellations, expected by mid-next week, followed by mailed checks. The conversation concludes with Bill acknowledging the timeline and thanking Jeff.
